input: I feel anxious and can't focus.

expected.quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
expected.author: Dan Millman

input: I'm really tired and drained today.

expected.quote: Rest if you must, but don’t you quit.
expected.author: Unknown
expected.suggested_action: Take a short walk and hydrate.

expected.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
expected.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
expected.suggested_action: Reflect on one small next step you can take.

input: I'm excited about a new project!

expected.author: Arthur Balfour
expected.suggested_action: Channel your energy into a small creative task today.

input: Overwhelmed with everything, can't catch a break.

expected.quote: You are allowed to pause. You are allowed to rest.
expected.author: Unknown
expected.suggested_action: Schedule a 10-minute break and breathe deeply.
